author: Esther Emma
content:
never did a HDR myself.
it's a interesting technic and i added it to my to-do list a long time ago.
the way you use it, i like the best. (the more realistic view in stead of the surrealistic ones.)
this image makes me want to be in Karinthie in this time of year. long walks through the woods. 
sun beaming and enlightening the path ahead of me. 
camera at hand and sure that will be the moment to proof the HDR technic myself.

have a nice day, andreas ðŸ™‚
